title: Lake Roosevelt National Recreation Area: Fur Trade and David Thompson
body: Fur Trade and David Thompson         Fur Trade and David Thompson Trunk Contents NPS Photo  Fur Trade and David Thompson This trunk contains early 1800s replica items from the fur traders and trapers along the Columbia River in the United States and Canada.   Trunk Reservations Trunks are geared for 3rd-9th grade, but it is intended as a resource for you and your students.     Fill out our reservation form to borrow this trunk or contact our education specialist for more information.
